content:
Trying to squeeze these in before the deadline. Let me know if you would like to pull. They are for the Non-normative content and there has been a lot of prior discussion here and in the WG meetings about each. Please review the trackers and let me know if you would like to pull.

Comment Submitters

•Irina Connelly

•Jack Wallace

•Julie Evans

•Lloyd McKenzie

•Ralf Herzog

Line Items

  • GF#15692 Add+an+element+to+ServiceRequest+to+indicate+whether+an+individual+chose+to+self-direct+the+service. (Jack Wallace) In Person Persuasive with Mod
  • GF#17424 Specimen.subject+must+be+optional (Lloyd McKenzie) Not Persuasive
  • GF#16153 Add+elements+to+ServiceRequest+for+specifying+a+quantity+of+service+being+requested. (Irina Connelly) In Person Persuasive
  • GF#17495 Observation+is+missing+a+reference+to+substance%2Freagent+used+to+produce+the+result (Ralf Herzog) Persuasive
  • GF#17380 Extend+Specimen.collection+by+adding+fasting+status (Julie Evans) Persuasive with Mod
  • GF#17389 Extend+Specimen+by+adding+specimen+condition (Julie Evans) Persuasive with Mod
P.S. the in person comments have been vetted by the commenters.
